verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, the way <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>: and he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> that was over against the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, and which was over against the <S%H1146>building<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

Before <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Over against the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> cubits which belonged to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, and over against the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> which belonged to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, was <S%H862>gallery<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H862>gallery<s%> in the third <S%H7992>story<s%>.

And <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was a <S%H4109>walk<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>' <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6442>inward<s%>, a <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and their <S%H6607>doors<s%> were toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

Now the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were <S%H7114>shorter<s%>; for the <S%H862>galleries<s%> took <S%H398>away<s%> from <S%H2007>these<s%>, more than from the <S%H8481>lower<s%> and the <S%H8484>middlemost<s%>, in the <S%H1146>building<s%>.

For they were in <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H5982>stories<s%>, and they had not pillars as the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts<s%>: therefore the uppermost was <S%H680>straitened<s%> more than the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> and the <S%H8484>middlemost<s%> from the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And the <S%H1447>wall<s%> that was <S%H2351>without<s%> by the <S%H5980>side<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, <S%H5980>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

For the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> that were in the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: <S%H6440>and<s%>, lo, before the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.
And from under these <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was the <S%H3996>entry<s%> on the east <S%H6921>side<s%>, as one <S%H935>goeth<s%> into <S%H2007>them<s%> from the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>.

In the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1444>wall<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1146>building<s%>, there were <S%H1508>chambers<s%>.

And the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the way of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> which were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>; according to their <S%H753>length<s%> so was their <S%H3651>breadth<s%>: and all their <S%H4161>egresses<s%> were both according to their <S%H4941>fashions<s%>, and according to their <S%H6607>doors<s%>.

And according to the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> that were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> was a <S%H6607>door<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, even the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1903>directly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1448>wall<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, as one entereth into <S%H935>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H6828>me<s%>, The north <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, which are <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, they are the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that are <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: there shall they <S%H3240>lay<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>; for the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

When the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H3318>in<s%>, then shall they not go out of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, but there they shall <S%H3240>lay<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> wherein they <S%H8334>minister<s%>; for they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>: and they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to that which pertaineth to the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Now when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4060>measuring<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%>, with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

He turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides<s%>: it had a <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, to make a <S%H914>separation<s%> between that which was <S%H6944>holy<s%> and that which was <S%H2455>common<s%>.
